publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2881 Malcolm Chisholm: Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/65), recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*
